Title: Mind Game
Description: 2004 animated film written and directed by Masaaki Yuasa . Premiered April 1 , 2018 . Presented in its original Japanese language audio with English subtitles on Toonami as part of an April Fools ' event

Title: Children Who Chase Lost Voices
Description: 2011 animated film directed by Makoto Shinkai . Premiered November 5 , 2016 on Toonami

Title: Dragon Ball Z : Broly - The Legendary Super Saiyan
Description: 1993 animated film based on the Dragon Ball Z anime series . Premiered December 21 , 2014 on Toonami

Title: Fullmetal Alchemist : The Sacred Star of Milos
Description: 2011 animated film based on the Fullmetal Alchemist : Brotherhood anime series . Premiered December 14 , 2014 on Toonami

Title: Dragon Ball Z : Cooler 's Revenge
Description: 1991 animated film based on the Dragon Ball Z anime series . Premiered May 24 , 2014 on Toonami

Title: Trigun : Badlands Rumble
Description: 2010 animated film set in the same universe as the 1998 Trigun anime series . Premiered December 28 , 2013 on Toonami

Title: Fullmetal Alchemist the Movie : Conqueror of Shamballa
Description: 2005 animated film sequel of the original 2003 Fullmetal Alchemist anime series . Premiered December 21 , 2013 on Toonami

Title: Summer Wars
Description: 2009 animated film by director Mamoru Hosoda . Premiered December 14 , 2013 on Toonami

Title: Akira
Description: 1988 animated film based on the manga series of the same name . Premiered December 7 , 2013 on Toonami

Title: Evangelion 2.22 You Can ( Not ) Advance
Description: 2009 animated movie remake of the Neon Genesis Evangelion TV series . Sequel to Evangelion 1.11 . Premiered August 31 , 2013 on Toonami

Title: Evangelion 1.11 You Are ( Not ) Alone
Description: 2007 animated movie remake of the Neon Genesis Evangelion TV series . Premiered March 17 , 2013 . The first film broadcast on Toonami since its revival in 2012

Title: Black Dynamite
Description: 2009 live-action movie that inspired the Adult Swim series . Aired on September 2 , 2012

Title: Bleach : The DiamondDust Rebellion
Description: Aired on December 5 , 2009 . First anime film to air on Adult Swim in high definition

Title: Bleach : Memories of Nobody
Description: Aired on September 5 , 2009

Title: G.I . Joe : Resolute
Description: 90-minute movie that aired April 25 , 2009

Title: The Room
Description: First aired on April 1 , 2009 as part of an April Fools ' Day prank . In 2010 it aired again on April Fools ' Day ; featuring Space Ghost interviewing Tommy Wiseau in the same format as Space Ghost Coast to Coast as bumps . The movie aired again on April 1 , 2011 , for the third year in a row . On April 1 , 2012 , part of the opening was aired , before cutting to T.O.M . from Toonami , opening an announced night of the block

Title: Aqua Teen Hunger Force Colon Movie Film for Theaters
Description: Feature film based on Aqua Teen Hunger Force , and was the first film adaption of an Adult Swim series . It was released in theaters on April 13 , 2007 . The film made its official television debut on March 31 , 2008 on Adult Swim

Description: Premiered December 23 , 2006

Description: Premiered August 12 , 2006
